summary: This mod adds various excerpts from Wagner's famous Ring Cycle into Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to feel like a Norse god while hacking away at bandits? Ever wanted to take Shadowmere into battle while hearing the screams of Valkyries at your side? Then this mod is for you! For this mod I have taken excerpts from Richard Wagner's Ring Cycle and placed them at appropriate times while you are exploring Skyrim. You have the option to keep Skyrim's original soundtrack and have it alternate with this one, or remove Skyrim's soundtrack completely and have Wagner 100% of the time. To install, drag and drop the data folder into your Skyrim directory.


Also, these are the instrumental versions of The Ring. I felt like the vocals were distracting, but if enough people ask, I can put them in.


NOTE: This mod was based off of No_Aardvarks_Allowed's Personalized Music mod AND ALSO REQUIRES THE PERSONALIZED MUSIC MOD.

Update: If requested, I could compile other Wagner operas into this mod, in separate downloads.
author: WJL4418
